thread.title: Little Mix's Jade Thirwall wears her dress back to front ALL DAY and doesn't realise
thread.title_full: Little Mix's Jade Thirwall wears her dress back to front ALL DAY and doesn't realise

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Little Mix's Jade Thirwall wears her dress back to front ALL DAY and doesn't realise
text:
Showbiz Little Mix's Jade Thirwall wears her dress back to front ALL DAY and doesn't realise The Little Mix star howls when fan points out she's wearing the her frock the wrong way round Share   
Little Mix’s Jade Thirwall wore her dress back to front for an entire day - and didn’t actually realise. 
The singer was doing a day of promo at Billboard magazine in the US and posed for pictures with admirers, but one eagle-eyed fan noticed that something was very wrong with Jade’s outfit in the pics. 
The fan tweeted the public service announcement to Little Mix, saying, “It’s still cute tho Jade it’s backwards - hope you did it on purpose”. Jade and the Little Mix girls (Photo: LitteMix/Twitter) Jade in her pink dress (Photo: LitteMix/Twitter) The dress Jade was wearing back to front (Photo: ASOS) There's that zip, at the back (Photo: ASOS) 
The pale pink £45 dress was supposed to have the zip detail to the back, but Jade had been wearing the dress with zip facing forward. 
Jade then proved she had a great sense of humour when she retweeted the hilarious mishap, saying “I am HOWLING, I had no idea but I did think it was odd to have the zip at the front and I wore it like that all day.” Jade had a minor wardrobe malfunction at the BRITs (Photo: Rex Features) Jade protecting her modesty (Photo: PA) 
The girls had flown to New York after their triumphant BRITs win for Best Single with the tremendous Shout Out To My Ex, as they’re the support act for Ariana Grande’s tour in the States. 
At the BRITs on Wednesday night, Jade had another wardrobe issue thanks to a revealing red carpet gown that left little to the imagination. 
Showing off her stunningly long legs in the expensive-looking white silk gown, the strong winds in London threatened to show off a little more than she had bargained for. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
